relation: MIT Associate Professor of Music, 1998-2006; conductor, MIT Symphony
MIT B.S. Aeronautical Engineering, 1947; MIT M.S.,1948; sang in the MIT Glee Club and the MIT Logarhythms
Founding director and conductor of the MIT Concert Band, 1949-1999
MIT S.B. 1969 and M.S. 1971 in Computer Science; active in many MIT performing groups
Conductor of orchestras in the United States, Latin America, and Europe
Composer, conductor; Professor of Music, Berklee College of Music
President, Commonwealth Energy Group Ltd.; active in Council for the Arts at MIT
Conductor, arranger, editor, and rehearsal pianist for Broadway theater productions in New York
